title: verifying my email
body: i am unable to play on my account because I am not getting a verify email sent to my account and it keeps asking me to yet im not getting the email so I cant use my account .....do to this what do I do

replies.body:
Heya Duckedyouup, 

Can you check your spam folder and double check you entered the email correctly? 

If you're still unable to verify your account... you can either try another email address or [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support and they should be able to manually help verify.

Sorry for the inconvenience   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
